data.title: Governor moves to bolster conservation efforts
data.excerpt: Governor Gavin Newsom called on local water suppliers to move to Level 2 of their contingency plans. This would help conserve water across all sectors. He also asked that a ban be considered on watering decorative lawns at businesses and institutions.
data.author: Kalin Kipling

og_meta.site_description: Learn more about current conditions, the stateâ€™s response and informational resources available to the public.
